tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT,
    blood_type VARCHAR(5),
    smoker BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE lifestyles (
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(id),
    diet VARCHAR(50),
    exercise VARCHAR(50),
    sleep_hours INT,
    stress_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE demographics (
    demographic_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    street_address TEXT,
    city TEXT,
    state TEXT,
    zip_code TEXT,
    country TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE lifestyles (
    lifestyle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    smoking_status TEXT,
    exercise_frequency TEXT,
    dietary_preference TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_history (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    treatment_plan TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_patient FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE lifestyle_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT,
    exercise_level VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT fk_patient FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height DECIMAL(5,2),
    weight DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE medical_history (
    patient_id INT,
    condition VARCHAR(50),
    diagnosis_date DATE,
    treatment VARCHAR(100),
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, condition)
)

CREATE TABLE lifestyle (
    patient_id INT,
    activity_level VARCHAR(20),
    diet_plan VARCHAR(50),
    exercise_plan VARCHAR(50),
    sleep_hours INT
)

CREATE TABLE medications (
    patient_id INT,
    medication_name VARCHAR(50),
    dosage VARCHAR(20),
    frequency VARCHAR(20),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    doctor VARCHAR(50),
    reason VARCHAR(100)
)
